metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Gale discuss the Moonrise General.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Can't say I love what they've done with the place.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Unsurprising, really. Fanatical cultists tend to care more for ambience than aesthetics.
0.context: NodeContext: A subject he feels he knows a little about. 'Ambience' Implication being cultists are more focused on inspiring fear/awe/dread than making the palce look nice.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Reason enough to put them all to the sword, I say.
